alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Anderson (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 10:12AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Elbert, southern Hart, south central Anderson and west central Abbeville Counties through 1045 AM EDT... At 1012 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles north of Elberton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elberton, Bowman, Lowndesville, Russell State Park, Lake Russell, Dewy Rose, Rock Branch, Nuberg, Sweet City and Vanna. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
